original_definition: 'site representative' means any person, undertaking or entity designated by the Member Stateas being responsible for the declarations referred to in Article 3(2);
generated_definition: 'site representative' means a designated representative for a site on a member state's territory, responsible for providing a general description of the site to the commission.

Article 3: 2.   Each Member State being a party to Additional Protocol 1999/188/Euratom, shall designate asite representative for each site on its territory who shall provide to the Commission a declaration containing a general description of the site, using the questionnaire shown in Annex II.
